section.title: Enable Orchestration service meters for Ubuntu
section.para: Telemetry uses notifications to collect Orchestration service meters. Perform these steps on the controller node.

section.title: Configure the Orchestration service to use Telemetry

listitem.para: Edit the /etc/heat/heat.conf and complete the following actions:

listitem.screen: # service heat-api restart # service heat-api-cfn restart # service heat-engine restart
